DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether one fispemifene dose regimen effective placebo treatment hypogonadism old men .
DOC.brief_title: A Preliminary Clinical Study Evaluate Fispemifene Treatment Hypogonadism
DOC.criteria: Total testosterone level < 240 ng/dL Serum LH FSH level within normal limit Elevated prolactin Evidence Benign Prostatic Hypertrophy History current breast cancer , prostate cancer , abnormal DRE elevate PSA malignancy Clinically significant endocrine/metabolic cardiovascular disease Significant polycythemia
